manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Alba Botanica Hemp Seed Oil Hand & Body Lotion Does your skin reflect your day - downright rough? Let this rich, creamy concoction deliver the zen your body craves. Infused with the soothing and smoothing trio of cold-pressed cannabis Sativa Seed, coconut and apricot Oils, skin eases into rich, rewarding hydration and an ultimate sense of calm. Namaste.

Leaping Bunny Certified* Alba Botanica is grounded in compassion and the ethical treatment of all living things. We look out for our furry friends by ensuring that none of our products, or any of the ingredients in them, are tested on animals. The Leaping Bunny* logo is an internationally recognized symbol for cruelty-free cosmetics, personal care, and household products. *Certification for cruelty free was given by the CCIC on October 1st, 2008. 100% Vegetarian* We love our friends, including the furry kind. That’s why we never test our products or any of the ingredients in them on animals. Our products contain no meat or by-products of animals. We also exclude all cruelly obtained animal ingredients. *see ingredients list Paraben Free Many of Alba Botanica products are packaged in bottles made from 100% post-consumer resin. Our unit cartons are made with FSC certified paperboard to ensure that the paper stock was sustainably sourced.

The Alba Botanica brand was born in 1979 and follows a simple mission – to Do Beautiful. To honor that vision, we created a vibrant line of body-loving products that nourish the skin, hair, and of course, the soul. Whether we’re creating a fan favorite formula or working on the next big thing, we’re dedicated to making high quality, 100% vegetarian products that overflow with botanical ingredients. From the choices we make in the field to the final products we put on shelves, we aim to help fellow women look beautiful on the outside while feeling beautiful on the inside.

Very Emollient Maximum Body Lotion Very Emollient Original Body Lotion Very Emollient Herbal Healing Body Lotion Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion More Very Emollient Body Care Products from Alba Botanica Botanicals such as aloe vera, green tea and chamomile are combined with antioxidants and alpha hydroxy acids to relieve dry, irritated skin. Made with botanical emollients such as shea butter, avocado oil and jojoba seed oil, this rich lotion hydrates and softens dry skin without a heavy or greasy feeling. Made with 0.4% colloidal oatmeal, our rich lotion soothes and calms inflamed, damaged skin. This rich, creamy lotion is made with virgin, unrefined coconut oil and coconut milk to nourish and intensely hydrate skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It puts it on the skin
reviews.reviewText: A coworker brought in a bottle of this lotion and I like it so much that I bought a bottle of it. My skin gets easily irritated by different lotions but not this one, it's good stuff

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love Alba Botanica, and was expecting the Cannabis Sativa Seed Oil to smell like the Herbal Healing lotion that I usually buy. While not overpowering, the scent is a bit more earthy and almost weedy to me.But the lotion itself is non-greasy and fabulous.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells good to me, a little goes a long way
reviews.reviewText: So when I remember to put this on it is great. I also have to remember when putting this on barely to push the pump since this spreads really well. I don’t have a reaction to this and my skin is finicky. In fact my face likes this better than it’s face lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: AMAZING lotion! I put it on and barely had to rub it in before it just soaked right into my dry skin leaving it velvety smooth... definitely a SCORE for my all over skin care routine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I use this after my prescription hand cream to seal it in. Lasts a long time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2022

reviews.reviewerName: Sharri and J RandallSharri and J Randall
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Too watered down but good for sensitive skin. . Great size.
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to like this. It finally went on a good enough price to give it a try. Had I gotten it at regular price I probably would have taken it back. It lasts a long time. I do like it in my toddlers skin because it’s sort of watered down and not too thick like some of the usual baby lotions. However, on me and my husbands skin it was like water. We were ashy about an hour later. I’d say this is soothing and great for going to sleep after a night bath or shower but don’t expect to go out on a day trip or too the beach with this on, if your brown skin like us, your legs will be white within an hour.
